docstr: `BLE` â€” Bitwise less than or equal to ### Description Determines whether an integral is a bitwise less than or equal to another. ### Syntax `RESULT = BLE(I, J)` ### Arguments type. | `J` | Shall be of `INTEGER` type, and of the same kind as `I`. ### Return value The return value is of type `LOGICAL` and of the default kind. ### Standard Fortran 2008 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also BGT, BGE, BLT
